message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.DB 

The paper discusses the automatic assignment of articles to research topics in the ScienceWISE knowledge management system, which involves analyzing the relationships between articles and concepts. This falls under the field of information retrieval (cs.IR) and specifically, topic modeling. The paper also mentions the use of ontologies and clustering algorithms, which are common in natural language processing (cs.CL) and data mining (cs.DB). Additionally, the paper deals with large volumes of technical articles, which suggests a focus on digital libraries (cs.DL) and possibly social networks (cs.SI) as well.
